w1.name: Mega Adhesive
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Singed''' spills a potent adhesive that lands to the target location over {{tt|{{rutngt|0.25}} to {{rutngt|0.5}}|See notes}}, creating a puddle at the area for 3 seconds which {{tip|ground|grounds}} all enemies within and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 60%.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Singed spills a potent adhesive that lands to the target location over Unknown value: rutngt 0.25 to Unknown value: rutngt 0.5, creating a puddle at the area for 3 seconds which grounds all enemies within and slows them by 60%.
w1.notes:
* The delay between the cast and the slow field being estabilished is inconsistent, due to a bug with tick rates.{{bug}}
** {{cai|Lay Waste|Karthus}} and {{ais|Defile|Karthus}} ticks beyond the first and {{cai|Let's Bounce!|Zac}} have similar issues.
* The goo missile is VFX only, to convey which location Singed threw the adhesive at. It has a fixed travel time but is independent from when the zone is established. It is not destructible by effects such as {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}.
* ''Mega Adhesive'' can be {{tip|cleanse|cleansed}} and resisted by {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immunity}}, providing immunity to the persistent area of effect if the target stays within the area.
** Leaving the area and entering back inside applies the {{tip|ground}} regardless.
* '''Singed''' {{tip|sight|reveals}} himself to enemies briefly if casting ''Mega Adhesive'' from the fog of war.

i1.name: Noxious Slipstream
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever '''Singed''' moves near a {{tip|champion}}, he gains {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds, stacking up to 25 times.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Whenever Singed moves near a champion, he gains 20% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds, stacking up to 25 times.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.

q1.name: Poison Trail
description: {{sbc|Toggle:}} '''Singed''' persistently leaves a toxic cloud behind his location for {{fd|3.25}} seconds.

Enemies within the cloud are dealt {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds over 2 seconds, during which they are also inflicted with {{tip|poison}}. The duration refreshes every {{fd|0.5}} seconds while inside the contaminated area.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Toggle: Singed persistently leaves a toxic cloud behind his location for 3.25 seconds.
Enemies within the cloud are dealt magic damage every 0.25 seconds over 2 seconds, during which they are also inflicted with poison. The duration refreshes every 0.5 seconds while inside the contaminated area.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage per Tick|{{ap|5 to 15}} {{as|(+ {{fd|11.25}}% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|5*8 to 15*8}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
q1.notes:
*Toggle abilities do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The clouds check for enemy targets in the area immediately upon being spawned. After a {{fd|0.25}}-{{fd|0.5}} second delay, they check every {{fd|0.25}} seconds again until they fade.
** Targets already with the DoT can have the debuff refreshed only every {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
** Due to the inconsistent offset between the first and future ticks is it possible for a static target to miss out on one refresh of the debuff, equal to 3 ticks of damage.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage per Tick: (+ 11.25% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 90% AP)

r1.name: Insanity Potion
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Singed''' drinks a potent chemical brew, entering a frenzy for 25 seconds which grants him {{sti|ap|{{as|'''bonus''' ability power}}}}, {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}}, {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}, {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' health regeneration}}}}, and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' mana regeneration}}}}.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Singed drinks a potent chemical brew, entering a frenzy for 25 seconds which grants him bonus ability power, bonus armor, bonus magic resistance, bonus movement speed, bonus health regeneration, and bonus mana regeneration.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Stats|{{ap|30 to 90}}}}
{{st|Regeneration per Second|{{ap|30/5 to 90/5}}|Total Regeneration|{{ap|30*5 to 90*5}}}}
r1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|120 to 100}}|Begins on-cast}}' as '0/100/80/0' and riot's value '120,110,100' as '120/110/100'

effects.str:

  • Regeneration per Second:

e1.name: Fling
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Singed''' picks up the target enemy and throws them over himself, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}, capped against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}, and {{tip|airborne|flinging}} them to a location 550 units behind his casting position over {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
If the target lands on {{ais|Mega Adhesive|Singed}} area, they are {{tip|root|rooted}} for a duration.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Singed picks up the target enemy and throws them over himself, dealing them magic damage, capped against minions and monsters, and flinging them to a location 550 units behind his casting position over 0.75 seconds.
If the target lands on Mega Adhesive's area, they are rooted for a duration.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|50 to 110}} {{as|(+ {{ap|6 to 8}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}|Maximum Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|350 to 410}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}
e1.notes:
* ''Fling'' can throw enemies over walls (circumstances permitting).
* {{tip|Slow-immune}} enemies will not be {{tip|root|rooted}} when ''flung'' into {{ai|Mega Adhesive|Singed}}.
* ''Fling'' is special cased to not {{tip|airborne|fling}} {{ci|Warwick}} while '''Singed''' is {{tip|suppression|suppressed}} by {{ai|Infinite Duress|Warwick}} after the cast time.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ % of target's maximum health) (+ 75% AP)
  • Maximum Non-Champion Damage: (+ 75% AP)

st_slices: (+ % of target's '''maximum''' health) (+ 75% AP)
